channel.title: Comments on: REVIEW: Joni Mitchell, Shine, Hear Music

item.title: By: IVo
item.dc:creator: IVo
item.description: Joni is the greatest. No wonder that Morrissey called her the greatest songwriter of all times. Shine is a ok album, although i think that Night Ride Home and Turbulent Indigo are better albums. To bad she is not touring anymore....
item.content:encoded: Joni is the greatest. No wonder that Morrissey called her the greatest songwriter of all times. Shine is a ok album, although i think that Night Ride Home and Turbulent Indigo are better albums. To bad she is not touring anymore….
